thread.section_title: PRTG Network Monitor Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von PRTG Network Monitor | paessler.com
thread.title: David Leonard
thread.title_full: PRTG Network Monitor bewertet von David Leonard

author: David Leonard
title: David Leonard
text: PRTG is a sysadmin's dream come true. When set up correctly (which of course can take some time and planning), it offers piece of mind, as well as quickly responding to could-be problems, before they become would-be problems, and eventuelly potential disasters. Five stars!
